title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the Financial Sector
abstract: This study aims to see the development of research on the topic of "AI on Finance" and research plans that can be carried out based on journals published on the theme. This research uses qualitative method with bibliometric analysis approach. The data used is secondary data with the theme "AI on Finance" which comes from the Dimension database with a total of 127 journal articles. Then, the data is processed and analyzed using the VosViewer application with the aim of knowing the bibliometric map of research development "AI on Finance" in the world. The results of the study found that in bibliometric author mapping the authors who published the most research with the theme "AI on Finance" were
topic: AI, Finance, Research Map, Artificial Intelligence
